metadata.title: Citi Double Cash Credit Card - TopFinanzas
metadata.description: Learn about the Citi Double Cash Credit Card benefits, requirements, and application process. Earn cash back on every purchase.
metadata.keywords: Citi Double Cash, credit card, cash back rewards, no annual fee, balance transfer, TopFinanzas

hero.title: Citi Double Cash Credit Card
hero.description: A card valued for its cash-back rewards, offering earnings on every purchase with no annual fee.

requirements.title: Requirements for the Citi Double Cash Credit Card

items.label: Credit Score
items.value: A good credit score of at least 670 is generally recommended.

items.label: Age Requirement
items.value: Applicants should be 18 years or older.

items.label: Income Documentation
items.value: Proof of income or employment details is often necessary.

applicationSteps.title: How to apply for the Citi Double Cash Credit Card

steps.title: Visit Citi's official website
steps.description: Navigate to Citi's website and locate the Double Cash Card application page.

steps.title: Provide personal details
steps.description: Complete fields for name, address, date of birth, and SSN.

steps.title: Income verification
steps.description: Submit income details as requested to confirm eligibility and determine credit limits.

steps.title: Review terms
steps.description: Carefully review the terms and conditions, including interest rates, fees, and rewards program details.

steps.title: Submit the application
steps.description: Once all information is confirmed, submit the application for an immediate decision.

benefits.title: Benefits of the Citi Double Cash Credit Card

items.title: Straightforward Cash-Back rewards
items.description: With the Citi Double Cash Card, earn 1% cash back when you buy and another 1% when you pay off purchases. This unique structure encourages timely payments and offers cash-back simplicity.

items.title: No annual fee
items.description: With no annual fee, you can maximize rewards without worrying about costs. This feature makes it an accessible option for a range of users.

items.title: Versatile redemption options
items.description: Redeem cash-back rewards as statement credits, deposits, or checks, providing flexibility to suit different needs.

items.title: Balance transfer feature
items.description: Citi offers an introductory APR on balance transfers, which can be useful for consolidating debt. Keep in mind, however, that transfer fees may apply.

callToAction.title: Ready to enjoy these benefits?
callToAction.description: Apply for the Citi Double Cash Credit Card today and start earning cash back on every purchase. Our simple application process takes just minutes to complete.
